resources.string: Why wait for the Next Day! We pick up your items and deliver them to your Customers on the Same Day.
Your Customers don’t pay with Credit Cards! No Problem, We collect Cash from them without any Extra Cost.
Always Looking for the Best Possible Deal? We offer you the Lowest Price on the Market for the Same Day Delivery!
We have a Solid Insurance Policy against any Lost Package or Damaged One. This means your Orders are Quite Safe with Us!
Your Online Order’s Shipping Status is always within reach. Now track all your orders through our Smart Online Platform.
Our Personnel are Highly Trained to handle any Inquires that may arise. Also, they can respond to Customers\' Special Requests.
Same Day Delivery is now Available for Your Business!
If you\'re interested about how we can help you, Just give us a call and we\'ll be glad to answer your Inquiry.
If you have an Inquiry or want to know more about our Price Quotes, Just send us an Email!
Our Office Location: 138 El-Banafseg Fifth Settlement, New Cairo, Cairo, Egypt.
Our Working Hours: Sunday to Thursday from 9 am to 5 pm.
A Client Inquiry regarding Raseel\'s Services
